Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The largest proportion ( 67 % ) of families due to other genes was found in families with four or five cases of female breast cancer only .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| female breast cancer |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "female breast cancer" as the disease for which families have a high proportion of cases. Therefore, the valid entity is "female breast cancer".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| female breast cancer |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "female breast cancer" as the disease for which families have a high proportion of cases. Therefore, the valid entity is "female breast cancer". The term "other genes" does not clearly refer to a disease, so it is not included in the table.
